mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(oneday, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS oneday FROM oneday_price WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND onestat_code = #{onestateCode}

SELECT * FROM oneday_price WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND oneday >= #{selectedDate} AND oneday <= (SELECT oneday FROM ( SELECT rownum as rn , FROM oneday_price WHERE oneday >= #{selectedDate} AND onestat_code = 'one02' AND room_Id = #{roomId} ORDER BY oneday ) WHERE rn > 0 AND rn < 2 )

SELECT TO_CHAR(SUM(oneday_price), '999,999,999') AS sum FROM oneday_price WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND oneday BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND (TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YY/MM/DD') - 1) GROUP BY room_id

SELECT TO_CHAR(oneday, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS oneday ,TO_CHAR(oneday_price, '999,999,999') AS oneday_price FROM oneday_price WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND oneday BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND (TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YY/MM/DD') - 1)

SELECT
,TO_CHAR(oneday, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS oneday_char FROM oneday_price WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND oneday BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND (TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YY/MM/DD') - 1)
